field.label: Scan for filetypes
field.help: Choose for which file types to scan, if unsure select all.

field.label: Send percentage data
field.help: The percentage of data that can be sent by the c-icap server before receiving the complete body of a request. This feature in conjuction with the folowing can be useful because if the download of the object takes a lot of time the connection of web client to proxy can be expired.

field.label: Start send pecerantage data
field.help: Only if the object is bigger than size then the percentage of data which defined by SendPercentData sent by the c-icap server before receiving the complete body of request.

field.label: Allow 204 responses
field.help: Disable 204 responses outside previews for virus_scan if your ICAP client does not support it.

field.label: Pass on error
field.help: Pass the content instead of blocking it, in the case when the virus scanner or the virus_scan module finds an error.

field.label: Max object size
field.help: The maximum size of files which will be scanned by antivirus service. You can use K and M indicators to define size in kilobytes or megabytes.
